page.title: 07TOURIST SURVEY
page.content: On Thursday,June 13th.1985 Class 2 of Westerham C.E.Primary School conducted a survey of visitors to Westerham. We interviewed 19 people from 7 different countries in half an hour. The visitors came from Australia,North America,Europe and even the Sudan. Most came by car, but one came by bicycle. Most people were staying in England for 3 weeks but one was staying for a year.Some stayed in Westerham for a few hours and some for 3 days. Most came to see historic buildings like Quebec House and Chartwell. They also came to see the antique shops. They thought the Green was most pleasant but the town was spoilt by traffic. More carparks and a by-pass would be helpful. However all agreed that Westerham was a pleasant place to visit.
